item.description:
** FREE ADVANCED SCREENING & DIRECTOR Q&A - JOSHUA**
"The story of a perfect boy who had a perfect plan"

WEDNESDAY, JUNE 20TH @ 7PM
Coolidge Corner Theater


** A brief question and answer session with the film's director, George Ratliff will follow this special advanced screening **

Email advanced.screening@gmail.com with "JOSHUA" as the subject line for your free passes to this special advanced screening.

JOSHUA

Synopsis:

"Joshua" is the tale of Brad (Sam Rockwell) and Abby (Vera Farmiga) Cairn, perfect Manhattan parents in a perfect Manhattan apartment whose perfect life begins to crack after the birth of their second child Lily. Shortly after Lily arrives home, a dark side of prodigy son Joshua (Jacob Kogan) slowly begins to reveal itself.
item.name: ** FREE ADVANCED SCREENING & DIRECTOR Q&A - JOSHUA**
